useCase.name: Manage Capabilities

preconditions.precondition: The system is running and accessible.

useCase.trigger: DevOpsEngineer or ApplicationDeveloper needs to manage the capabilities.

mainSequence.step: DevOpsEngineer deploys a capability via the Capability Manager.
Capability Manager executes the deployment command.
Capability Manager sends the deployment request to the REST API.
ApplicationDeveloper requests to develop a new capability.
Capability Manager displays the existing capabilities using the bin command.
